reviews.review: Still short (like thefirst one). But the Co-Op mode remake the game in a so fun way. Still need to be a bit more chanlanging.
Even better than the first! But a little short for the price

Mit den Spiel Portal 2 ist es VALVe mal wieder gelungen mir viele sch√∂ne Stunden vor den PC zu bescheren :-)
Meiner Meinung nach ein Spiel das man einfach gespielt haben muss <333
... und jetzt heist es noch die Errungenschaften holen und dann auf Portal 3 oder eine fortsetzung von Half-Life warten :DDDD .. VALVe haut rein, ich brauch wieder was zum Spielen *g*

Wow! Valve does it again. This game is everything that I expected it to be and more! With fun and challenging puzzles, memorable characters, and a never-ending wit that cannot be topped. This makes it up there as one of the greatest games of all time. Definitely a must have!

If you played the first one then you must play this. 
This is easily the best writing I've ever seen in a game.

A tad on the short side, but a more than worthy sequal to and excellent game.

The mood, atmosphere, humor, complexity/ fun of puzzles, dialoge, humor, and visuals are leaps and bounds ahead of the original.

Without a doubt, one of the best $45 bucks i've spent in a game.
A solid contender for GOTY 2011

I'd like to make a proper review but i just can find the words to describe how amazing this game is. It's just beyond epic in every aspect..

If you don't have it, don't even think twice. BUY IT NOW!!!!

My Rating: 11/10
Everything you wanted portal 1 to be and more.

Sequels are usually a joke, but in this case, Portal 2 is better than the first. Why? More immersive story and way more puzzles and challenges. Awesome music and effects make game the even more amazing. If you have the time, the money and the ability to avoid the Co-op Cash Shop, BUY IT it is well worth it and you will enjoy it alot.
gostei e recomendo
zOMG, words can't do this game justice. Get it or die... because living without it is a pointless existence.
buy it. duh.
melhor jogo de 2011  facilmente
I'm in space.

I recommend this game, The game itself is nicely presented, and the co-operative mode is very fun if you have a friend who co-ordinates themselves well when alongside you, I do have a few complaints, for instance the game was heavily set outside the test chambers, which is good, being able to explore the bowels of the Enrichment Center, but I found these levels increasingly difficult to navigate.

All in All though, 9 out of ten, it kept my attention long enough for me to finish it in one sitting.
Fucking amazing!
You absolutely MUST get this if you enjoyed the first one! Many laugh-out-loud moments and some great puzzles.
Awesome story.  Too few secrets, too many loading screens, too short challanges :( curse you consoles !  Gimmeh my 5+ linking portals !

...wow.

just wow...

valve has such a way to immerse you in a game...

its WAY more responsive then portal, and WAY more "deep" there are just some many question i have, and valve does what they always do and keep you wanting more! 

i may have beaten the game but im sad that its over. i hope they can live up to what they have done when they actually give the world the next halflife game.

to valve- thank you for making something i got to enjoy SO much! 

to everyone else- GET THE DAMN GAME ALREADY!!!!

to those who own it- do you miss your potatoe?
Valve, you sure have outdone yourself.

PC Gamer calls it "the best game of the year"

i couldn't agree more. this game is simply amazing

My IQ is 200 and I finished Portal 2 in 30 minutes because I finished each puzzle faster than my computer could process the maps.

This game is so short and easy for intelligent people like me as are all games today and I feel like making people aware of this every time I discuss games on internet forums so that they understand how short and easy games are today, and that if they take longer than it took me then they are complete retards and shouldn't be playing video games to begin with.

I wish developers would make games for people of my superior intellect so I do not have to feel all games are so short and easy.
fucking awesome if u loved the first one you well definently want to buy this
Yes.
buy it.

Il gioco pi√π bello mai creato fin'ora. Unico,pieno di colpi di scena,di una genialit√† impressionante. La storia,i personaggi,gli enigmi,lo stile. Tutto rasenta la perfezione. 
E poi giocato in cooperativa da un senso di soddisfazione enorme. Grazie Valve per questa opera immensamente bella.
Excelente, buena trama y muy divertido!
This is Portal 2, if you have played Portal 1, this game is a must. It holds up very very well, acting is perfect, and Coop missions are perfect too. just buy it on a sale as soon as possible

If Portal 2 was a man, he'd be so very very beautiful. I would have his manbabies and hold his hand and do all the things in a man-and-man relationship. I would be the giggly giddy womanly-man in the relationship and do all the things a womanly-man would do.

Seriously, buy it, play it, enjoy it. Potatoes create 1.1v of electricity.
Y'all like you some Science? Then you gonna LOVE this!! In no way is this a let-down compared to the first game, definately worth your monies.
L'excellence
Gahhhhhhhhhhhh (is a good thing)
Not time to recommend - must play Portal 2. Buy this bloddy game!!!
Chuck Norris Can Do The "Still Alive" And The "Empty Gesture" Achievements At The Same Run.
Glados is my wifu.
Incredibly entertaining puzzles in single & co-op. WAY TO GO VALVE! YOU GGUYS DID IT AGAIN!

A well executed game. They sadly don't have the diversity vents but they threw in a few unexpected goodies. The plot is very witty, with several twists, and oddly you develop an affinity for the mute heroine and the crazy robots that have been trying to kill her.

I do wish it were a bit longer or more challenging, or at least had a challenge mode: I completed both single player and co-op in just over 8 hours. I wish I was stumped more often. (I don't mean to sound arrogant but I'm good at thinking creatively.)

That being said, there's a lot of attention to detail in this game, and it's very well scripted.
Worth it, Really fun :)  A few nice hard levels to get you thinking :)

Good and likeable game. Ejoyed single player a lot. I was lost for the rest of the world for the whole two days while I was playing it! I am even prepared to tell this one is better than the original one.
Great game, very funny and spooky at the same time!
Brings a whole new life to Valve's series of portal. HDR and effects make this game 10/10 alone. Definitely distracted gamers from wanting HL Episode 3 for a little.
Just play it
tres bon jeu, vraiment, pour ceux qui aiment l'humour et le reflexion, foncez, c'est delirant¬£.
This game is one of those few games that acctually got me excited about playing it. The story is phenomenal.
GAME OF THE YEAR. ALL YEARS. Yes.
O jogo √© fant√°stico! Se voc√™ gostou do primeiro, seria um crime deixar de jogar o segundo :)
Buy it, or Cave Johnson will burn your house down with lemons.

Best game I've ever played, this is Valve's masterpiece. One hundred times better than Portal, this sequel excels in every aspect: great story, gameplay, music, graphics, puzzles, environment, and coop.
If you don't have it yet... seriously, you don't know what you're missing out on. Buy it already, you won't regret it.
Pure Epicness, Most genius game i've played since portal 1. A definite favorite.

Portal 2 √® uno dei migliori giochi rilasciati da mamma Valve al momento in ricorcolazione. Oltre a dei puzzle test estremamente ben riusciti, presenta una storia veramente ben ingegnata, con battute e frasi piene zeppe di sarcasmo veramente divertenti, una colonna sonora da oscar, ed un comparto estremamente leggero ma efficace.

L'unica pecca √® la durata, infatti non ci dovreste mettere pi√π di 13 ore a finirlo (dipende da quanto siete ovviamente bravi a risolvere le varie test chamber), il che √® un peccato, dato che alla fine del gioco vi ritroverete a chiedere con gioia un seguito, che difficilmente vedr√† purtroppo la luce.

Per fortuna per√≤ il workshop aumenta il divertimento grazie alle camere di test create dagli utenti, e le varie mod appositamente create come ad esempio: "Portal Stories: MEL".

Il mio consiglio spassionato √® di comprare questo titolo senza alcuna esitazione, anche visto il prezzo a cui viene venduto durante i vari saldi, che si aggira sui due euro. State certi che non ve ne pentirete affatto.

Aperture science is back! well... not in the same shape as it used to be, but it's back!
This is one of Valve's best looking games at the moment, its filled with great story and gameplay. the leveldesign is absolutely fantastic and there is no part which isn't good in this game. the puzzles aren't really that hard in singleplayer though. Co-op, on the other hand, is a whole different story. Expect to be stuck for a while in several rooms due the more complex puzzles. Plus you can have fun by squashing, burning and drowning your friend! :D This is definitely a must buy!
Do yourself a favour and buy this game *NOW*. You won't regret it.
Simply one of the most entertaining games I have ever played.

I just finished the game last night, Co-Op a few days ago.

If you're wondering why you should buy this, think of portal... now of Co-Op... now of co-op portal.

Yeah.
Price is a bit high but a good game overall.

A glorious romp through G.L.A.D.O.S's world; chracterised by interesting puzzles, and kept from becoming dry by consistantly funny commentry.  The only downsize is that Portal 2 is slightly on the short side for a standalone release and, bizzarely, has a shop for incidental content on launch.  It's still a must buy though as the 9-10 hour campaign and 6ish hour co-op is stuffed full of quality; it's without a single filler puzzle, which is quite the acheivement in and of itself.

The Citizen Kane of computer games!  

I've never seen Citizen Kane or know what that means but it feels right, damn it.
genius!
A rare case of a sequel being better than the original. Defiantly worth buying.

Maybe short and will even more shorter if you smart enough. But every second you'll play in this game is really worth the price. The story might not new but still fun, all the characters and their conversation is really drive the game. Fun, Smart, Cute. (also it even more fun in co op and I used to thought TF2 is the funniest)

This is the best game of 2011 period. The visuals are absolutely stunning, Valve has perfectly balanced the modern architecture of Aperture Science with the idea of the invading flora and fauna of the outside world, making the visuals that little bit more impressive. The script is brilliant, the lines are perfectly crafted to reflect the individual characters, satirical, sarcastic and just plain funny.

To top it off, the game itself is pure gold. The mechanics of the Portal Device are masterfully applied to the world in conjunction with the chamber puzzles to create an extremely challenging, but immensely engaging game that never looses its appeal. You won't know what hit you.

Couldn't have asked for a better game from Valve.
10/10
Awesome game! Must buy. Silly gamers that wanna wait until the game is on sell. The game is worth 49.99

If you've played Portal, you'll walk into Portal 2 expecting a twist here or a turn there, but somehow Valve managed to make their follow-up game keep you guessing. The sequel replaces the original's creepiness with intensity; if the first game was fearing what might be under the bed, the second is making eye contact with it & running for your life. This is balanced with plenty of humor, lightening the mood often enough to stave off the need for numerous breaks, but thankfully not overdoing it & allowing the gravity of situations to be maintained. For those concerned about the game's length, it's easily two to three times longer than the first in single player.
The addition of co-op will surely add hours to the game's replay value & there's even some aesthetic-only downloadable content for the co-op section; for those TF2 fans whose main question is "...but will there be hats?" the answer is a resounding "Yes, there are several."
In conclusion, money well spent; a great game.

This game is the sequel to what many people claim the second coming of Christ. And now it goes on forever with fanmade community puzzles and so. With a snooker cue to the genitals humor factor, and it's many puzzles, and short sightseeing tours packed in, there is no excuse not to buy this game.
Game of year 2011!

This is one of the best games i've ever played!
Money well spent!
best game ever played
good entertainment, but the price is a bit steep for the content. I suggest you wait for a sale and then grab it from 50% off.
This game is super fun, waaaaay more content than the first version, and not quite as easy. If you liked Portal you will LOVE Portal 2.

Great game some of the tests are nice and hard but never to the point you want to rage.

Co-op is nice and some of the harder tests are real tricky best done with mic's other wise expect to take time trying to get the other player to understand whats needed to be done.

Its only down side is the number of load screens you will see there fast but just so many of them.
Simplemente jueguenlo, es grandioso :) GOTY

Portal 2 is beautiful, engaging and a blast to play. 

Genius writing mixed with very creative gamedesign and just fantastic voice acting.

GET IT NOW!

This AAA title is a must-have purchase. Portal 2 continues the story and offers new game mechanics in the form of beams, lazers, dynamic liquids, new cubes, and more. The puzzles are easy to get into and become progressively more difficult. The co-operative play is extremely satisfying once you understand how to properly gesture to your team mate... and then intentionally drop them into a pit of acid. The free level editor and community made maps extend the fun, adding ridiculous amounts of replayability and content.
Awesome game, totally worth the price.

Now, Portal 2 is one of those rare games that makes its predecessor completely obsolete. There are more puzzles, more characters, better graphics and sound, more variables in the puzzles, and a surprising story that went above and beyond my expectations. Unfortunately, once you‚Äôve beaten both campaigns, there‚Äôs nothing left to do. Even with that shortcoming, however, Portal 2 is one of the most enjoyable gaming experiences I‚Äôve had for quite a while. I'm not going to shout about how great this game is. Il let you find out!
Not owning this is a sin, and you will burn in robot hell (which is a real place).

Brilliant, and in most aspects as good or better than the first. Single player is much longer and slightly harder, even if it has a few dull parts and the humor isn't as great. Co-op mode is fantastic, and provides a greater challenge and some laughs. Single+Coop is about 12-20 hours long, so it's well worth the cost.
The most beautiful and challenging game I've ever played.
Fantastic game, one of the greatest ever.
u need this.
Say YES!
like!
A must have game! It comes with potatoes! Buy now! Note: By no means am I advertising for test subjects for the progression of science.
Amaaaaaaaazing game. Get it
game of the year, hands down. hilarious and fun and challenging like whoa. WHOA.

Clearly one of the best gaming experiences this year. Hell, it could even pass as one of the best of all time. Portal 2, like its predecessor, is incredibly fun, innovative and down right full of good laughs. The game is short and sweet and doesn't over stay its welcome like Portal 1. Some may find that disapointing, but with the added feature of co-op, there will still be many hours worth gameplay to be had with a friend. And with inevitable updates in the future, one can only see that this game will truly age well. 
 
Pros: Everything! 
 
Cons: Nothing!
Another great game from Valve, maybe the best up to date. Co-op makes it even better, entertaining and funny. Presumably the game of the year.

You are an unbelievable moron for not buying this game! It's THAT GOOD!

Oh BTW when you do buy it; don't look at the achievements until you beat the game.  The descriptions of the achievements spoil the ending.

Top game!! The puzzling is mind-bending as usual with some really creative parts, and plenty of humour to be enjoyed from the various NPCs right from the start. Nice lengthy single player run-through, yet to try the co-op mode, but if the single player is anything to go by, the co-op stretch has the potential to set itself as an unforgettable gem in the history of games.

Buy it...or else i'll light someone you met once and dont really like on fire!!!!!......

But seriously....its pretty good, totally not worth the death of a random, unliked aquaintance.
A must buy, this game is one of the best games i've played. highly recommended to puzzle and FPS lovers. its a good game for hardcore and casual gamers!!!  :D
